org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer
Class JXRendererHyperlink

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.AbstractButton
                  javax.swing.JButton
                      org.jdesktop.swingx.JXHyperlink
                          org.jdesktop.swingx.renderer.JXRendererHyperlink
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, PainterAware
public class JXRendererHyperlink
extends JXHyperlink
implements PainterAware

A JXHyperlink optimized for usage in renderers and with a minimal background painter support.

Note: the painter support will be switched to painter_work as soon it enters main.

Author:
Jeanette Winzenburg
See Also:
Serialized Form

updateUI

public void updateUI()
Description copied from class: JXHyperlink
Notification from the UIManager that the L&F has changed. Replaces the current UI object with the latest version from the UIManager.

setToolTipText

public void setToolTipText(java.lang.String text)

Overridden to not automatically de/register itself from/to the ToolTipManager. As rendering component it is not considered to be active in any way, so the manager must not listen.

Overrides:
setToolTipText in class javax.swing.JComponent
